A mụrụ Caitlin Cherry na 1987 na Chicago, Illinois. Cherry nwetara akara ugo mmụta MFA ya Columbia University in 2012; na nzere BFA ya site na School of the Art Institute of Chicago in 2010. O sokwa na ya Yale University Summer School of Art in Norfolk, Connecticut na 2009
Ka ọ na-erule 2020, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka ónyé enyemaka Prọfesọ nké nka na Mahadum Virginia Commonwealth

Ọrụ ya na-enyocha isiokwu dị iche iche, gụnyere nnọchiteanya na ịhụ ányá nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii ka ha na-emetụta usoro ike na nchekwa. Ọ na-eji usoro ngwakọta eme ọrụ ya, na-ejikọta ihe ọkpụkpụ, ntinye, na eserese.
